Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Ah, Babylonian. You're early.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'My apologies. Just wait for me over there. I still need to repair a few things.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I've got time. I was just surprised.", 3: '11'}
{2: 'The Forsaken leader needs to repair things himself.', 3: '12'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "The team in charge of maintenance is occupied today, so I'm standing in for a bit.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We need them for the battle ahead, after all, and I'm the only one here who knows how to fix them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I've done this a lot in the past, anyway. Just need to awaken my muscle memory.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You used to do this?', 3: '16'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I did.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We didn't have enough people or gear when we started the Forsaken. I needed to learn how to fix weapons, vehicles, appliances... A little bit of everything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Could you fix it all?', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Of course not. Some things couldn't be fixed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Those would go inside the furnace to be melted and reforged. Resources were scarce, so we needed every bit we could save.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'All of them? No exception?', 3: '22'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...We tried to save something for everyone if we could.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Many things were also fixed but not retrieved. The owners weren't with us anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'People related to the owners would show up and take them... for a price, obviously.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Perhaps it's better to have some keepsakes from the ones we lost.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Alright, enough with the long face. I'm almost done.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We can start our mission after I finish repairing this batch.', 4: '1'}
